extendedInfo.description: Longbow is a fun and challenging 3D archery game for phones and tablet devices.Adjust your aim, draw your arrow, and strike distant targets to score big!Shoot for the bullseye in the village, knock over targets on the castle wall, or destroy barrels from horseback along the 4 mile stretch of mountainous terrain. Longbow's three distinct stages are easy to learn but challenging to master. You'll need to consider the wind, distance, and even your trusty steed's speed to consistently score high! Can you shoot an apple off someone's head? Turn a scarecrow into a pin cushion? These challenges and more await!â Use your fingers to aim and draw your bow. â Three difficulty levels for each game mode. (Try expert mode for an extra challenge!)â On-line leaderboards!â Detailed 3D graphics and sound!â Looks great on phones and tablets!Can you master the bow and become a true archer?HOW TO PLAY:Slide one finger across the screen to aim. Press the arrow icon in the corner to draw your bow. Release the button to fire.In village mode:Check the wind speed and direction in the top left corner of the screen. At the highest difficulty level, the swaying trees, sound of the wind, and dust kicked up by gusts will be your only clues.Expert mode removes the bow cross-hairs and wind speed from the screen. You'll need to use experience and intuition to score big!You can earn an extra 10 points if you manage to strike the apple (...not the Adam's apple) in the bonus round.In castle mode:Each round is 90 seconds long.Shoot all targets in a set quickly to score big!Striking the scarecrow awards bonus points at the end of a round depending where the arrows hit.Accuracy is important!In horse archery mode:Shoot the targets along the highland circuit.The further away you are when the arrow hits a target, the more bonus points are awarded.Keep striking targets to maximize the bonus awarded.Higher difficulty levels increase the horse's speed.

reviews.title: Very Important That You Read This
reviews.comment: Create an option to change the fire button to the left. Makes it easier to control especially for right handed players. Also, you should add more levels. Bow upgrades and animals/people to target. All in all this is a good game
reviews.author: Elie Palima

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: I\'ve seen better..but you can\'t possibly expect someone to pay for such a clunky game. The William Tell part WAS a nice touch though...
reviews.author: Shawnee Longbow

reviews.title: Runs perfectly
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t crashed yet.  Perfect restroom break fun.
reviews.author: Josh Laughlin

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Can\'t seem to get that apple but a fun quick time waster. Not worth 5 stars due to subpar controls. Give it a go, you\'ll enjoy it for the quick pace and relay value.
reviews.author: Vlad Jennings

reviews.title: Upgrade fault
reviews.comment: I use to like this game and waited a long time for the upgrade. Now that its here....its horrible ...did you even test run this game? Amateur hour!
reviews.author: Jnbravo B

reviews.title: Total rip off
reviews.comment: I went on this and it instantly crashed my phone DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
reviews.author: Bethan Jeffries

reviews.comment: Wont load! It\'s crap mabey try a simple game like x\'s n o\'s that might be better since ur beginers at this...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes phone
reviews.comment: Looks like it would be a great game, unfortunately it freezes my phone requiring a battery pull.
reviews.author: Brian ginoza

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This free version is so good but the paid version is a waste because it has only two levels and after that you have to pay and one more thing I am downloading this because I saw BRAVE today
reviews.author: Chiranjeevi bhatt

reviews.title: Awsum
reviews.comment: Nice game a must try archery
reviews.author: Sohaib Hassan

reviews.title: Nice looking, could be improved
reviews.comment: Game looks great, but there\'s no frame of reference for wind affecting the shot.  Instructions tell you how to shoot, but a quick tutorial would be more helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Forze me phone
reviews.comment: Omg I was on the third round then bam froze my eniter phone for like 5 miniutes otherwise I would have rated it a 4
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Nice graphics, fun to play,good time killer. Needs more levels of scenery,different places for the target. How about some knights or soldiers coming at you. Few improvements and it will get a 5 star rating.
reviews.author: A Google User
